description: cuff we implemented from collaborators at U Pitt, 1 mm diameter, 4 contacts, used for preclinical studies

params.description: Can have the value of 1 or 2. Adds conical shaped holes in TubeCuff. If 1 hole, centered longitudinally in cuff. If 2, evenly spaced by Pitch_holecenter_holecenter about longitudinal center of cuff
params.name: N_holes_Pitt

params.description: Angular coverage of cuff
params.name: Theta_Pitt

params.description: Z-position of cuff center
params.name: Center_Pitt

params.description: Cuff inner diameter
params.name: R_in_Pitt

params.description: Cuff outer diameter
params.name: R_out_Pitt

params.description: Length of cuff
params.name: L_Pitt

params.description: Wrap of the cuff (as compared to 360 degree wrap for continuous insulation) before expansion to accommodate the nerve
params.name: percent_circ_cuff_pre_Pitt

params.description: Wrap of the cuff (as compared to 360 degree wrap for continuous insulation) after expansion to accommodate the nerve
params.name: percent_circ_cuff_Pitt

params.description: Rotates TubeCuff CCW by angle
params.name: Rot_def_Pitt

params.description: Diameter of holes in TubeCuff at the surface of the inner diameter
params.name: D_hole_Pitt

params.description: Used so that the cone used to cut hole in the cuff extends half this distance from the inner and outer edge of the part
params.name: Buffer_hole_Pitt

params.description: Distance from edge of the cuff seam to the center of the holes
params.name: L_holecenter_cuffseam_Pitt

params.description: Distance between cuff holes, pitch from center to center along the length of the cuff
params.name: Pitch_holecenter_holecenter_Pitt

params.description: Contact width
params.name: w_contact_Pitt

params.description: Z-length of contact
params.name: z_contact_Pitt

params.description: Fillet for RectangleContact corners
params.name: fillet_contact_Pitt

params.description: Length of cuff
params.name: L_cuff_Pitt

params.description: Thickness of contact
params.name: thk_contact_Pitt

params.description: Depth of fill material into the cuff before the contact. This is used to create an associated recess/fill domain with a contact.
params.name: recess_Pitt

params.description: Cuff thickness
params.name: thk_cuff_Pitt

params.description: Rotational position of contact 1 in Pitt.json
params.name: theta_pos_contact1_Pitt

params.description: Rotational position of contact 2 in Pitt.json
params.name: theta_pos_contact2_Pitt

params.description: Rotational position of contact 3 in Pitt.json
params.name: theta_pos_contact3_Pitt

params.description: Rotational position of contact 4 in Pitt.json
params.name: theta_pos_contact4_Pitt

params.description: z-distance between contacts
params.name: pitch_Pitt

params.description: Distance fill extends beyond cuff boundary
params.name: Thk_fill_Pitt

params.description: Gap between cuff and nerve
params.name: thk_medium_gap_internal_Pitt

params.description: 1 to preserve surface area, 2 to preserve shape of contact to the dimensions provided
params.name: Rect_def_Pitt
